testcase.name: Verify home page navigation

testcase.name: Register with email id - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I launch browser......................................................passed And I Navigate to the url "https://tutorialsninja.com/demo/index.php?route=account/login".passed And I click on MyAccount....................................................passed And I click Register........................................................passed And I enter new account details for mandatory fields "Kevin" "Joy" "04123456789" "Kevin123" "Kevin123".passed And I click Privacy Policy..................................................passed And I click on Continue.....................................................passed Then I verify Account is created............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Warning message displayed for mandatory fields - Example #1.1

"First Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!" "Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!" "E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!" "Telephone must be between 3 and 32 characters!"
